titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon Mijn Heer Fagels letter concerning our penal laws and tests with remarks upon that subject, occasioned by the publishing of that letter.

notesStmt.note: "Allowed to be publish'd this 13th day of July 1688."
"Epistle dedicatory" addressed to William Penn Esq.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
